reviews.review:
Fun! It was on sale for $2, best $2 I've ever spent! Somewhat hard. I didn't have too much trouble with the game, though.

All in all, 5 out of 5 for story, gameplay, graphics, logic, and level editor (which is super amazing. I didn't know how they would do it!).

Thanks Valve!

I seldom get to say this in a review... I love every single bit of this game... from music to game play to the puzzles and especially the story... everything are still in its best shape even now on 2021. After all these years it still managed to bring laughter and joy. This game will never grow old! <3

For a 10 year old game, this game has all the love from the community. Which ended up with tons of community contents as well. It's well worth the price imo!

Very unique game. Makes you think outside the box. Cool story line comical NPCs and very cool rooms and tests you have to perform. Portal One was amazing but this tops it for sure. And Wheatly is awesome!!

Well here we are again.
It's always such a pleasure.
Remember when you tried
To kill me twice?
Oh how we laughed and laughed.
Except I wasn't laughing.
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice.

You want your freedom?
Take it.
That's what I'm counting on.

I used to want you dead
But
Now I only want you gone.

She was a lot like you.
(Maybe not quite as heavy).
Now little Caroline is in here too.
One day they woke me up -
So I could live forever.
It's such a shame the same
Will never happen to you.

You've got your
Short sad
Life left.
That's what I'm counting on.
I'll let you get right to it -
Now I only want you gone.

Goodbye my only friend.
Oh, did you think I meant you?
That would be funny
If it weren't so sad.
Well you have been replaced.
I don't need anyone now.
When I delete you maybe
I'll stop feeling so bad.

Go make some new disaster.
That's what I'm counting on.
You're someone else's problem.

Now I only want you gone.
Now I only want you gone.
Now I only want you gone
its super fun and creepy but fun you should play it 10 bucks
This thing is mind bending super interesting gameplay love the maps and graphic of the game it just amazing

This game is a classic. It has a great story for a game that came out in 2011 and still holds up today. If you want a good gaming experience that you will remember this is it. A must-play game in my opinion.
Good game but after you complete story mode, there's not much to do in singleplayer. Maybe add advanced chambers (like in Portal).

Is there anything i can say about this game that hasn't been already? Incredible game with incredible writing and spectacular level design. I miss games like these. Where they take an out of the box concept, like f***ing portals that connect physical space, and create a whole game centered around it. I must admit, completing a brain-meltingly difficult test without the help of the internet was more rewarding than killing a boss in Dark Souls 3. I recomend this game to anyone who loves a classic puzzle game with great writing. An exceptional ode to videogames, it was a fun ride from start to finish.
The cake is still a lie
Sem palavras: 5 estrelas , mesmo depois de anos esse jogo continua perfeito
